column4: Can someone please help me? I can no longer access the internet in Ubuntu 9.04. It worked fine previously in Ubuntu 9.04. I am connecting wirelessly with a PCMCIA card. I can connect to my network but when I open firefox I get "server not found." I have tried more than one card but still have had no luck.
could it be some proxy setting
I don't use a proxy. In firefox I have always had it set to "No proxy"
should I be using ndiswrapper or madwifi
